ValidationRule.description: WM Market Area must be selected when WM Vendor is selected
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.Name = 'STP Eligibility', NOT(ISNULL(MAS__c)) , WM_Vendor__c = false, All_WM_Vendors__c = true, Parent_VID__c = null )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: WM Market Area cannot be selected without selecting WM Vendor
